org.apache.archiva.components.graph.api

Interface Edge<V extends Node<V>>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - The node implementation.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseEdge

    public interface Edge<V extends Node<V>>
    The edge links a source node to a destination node. A edge instance is always part of a certain graph instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      V getDestination()
      Returns the node, that is on the destination end of this edge.
      Graph<V> getGraph()
      Returns the graph where this edge was created.
      String getId()
      Returns the identifier of this edge.
      String getLabel()
      Returns the label of this edge.
      V getSource()
      Returns the node, that is on the source end of this edge.
      RelationType getType()
      Returns the RelationType of the edge.
      double getWeight()
      Returns the weight of this edge.
      void setLabel(String label)
      Sets the label of this edge to the given string.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        String getId()
        Returns the identifier of this edge. The id must be unique for given graph.
        Returns:
        the identifier of this edge

      • getLabel

        String getLabel()
        Returns the label of this edge. The label must not be unique. If the label was not set, it should return an empty string.
        Returns:
        the label of this edge, or a empty string

      • setLabel

        void setLabel(String label)
       throws NullPointerException
        Sets the label of this edge to the given string.
        Parameters:
        label - the label string, that must not be null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the label parameter is null

      • getGraph

        Graph<V> getGraph()
        Returns the graph where this edge was created.
        Returns:
        the graph instance

      • getSource

        V getSource()
        Returns the node, that is on the source end of this edge.
        Returns:
        the source node

      • getDestination

        V getDestination()
        Returns the node, that is on the destination end of this edge.
        Returns:
        the destination node

      • getWeight

        double getWeight()
        Returns the weight of this edge. For standard graph implementations the default should be 1.0, but graph implementations may decide to set another default.
        Returns:
        the weight of this edge

      • getType

        RelationType getType()
        Returns the RelationType of the edge. If nothing is set, the StandardRelationType.DEFAULT should be returned.
        Returns:
        the type of the edge
